com.facebook.litho

Class ErrorEventHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.litho.EventHandler<ErrorEvent>
      • com.facebook.litho.ErrorEventHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventDispatcher, HasEventDispatcher, Function<Void>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DefaultErrorEventHandler

    public abstract class ErrorEventHandler
extends EventHandler<ErrorEvent>
implements HasEventDispatcher, EventDispatcher
    This class is an error event handler that clients can optionally set on a ComponentTree to gracefully handle uncaught/unhandled exceptions thrown from the framework while resolving a layout.
